Reviews.Title: Wrong item false advertising
Reviews.Author: Mr.pinder
Reviews.Content: I thought i was buying a 7" inch tablet but i got a no name cheap netbook it looks like a toy i'm very upset...

Reviews.Title: Not the best tablet out there.
Reviews.Author: doctari
Reviews.Content: I guess you get what you pay for with this tablet, and good luck finding drivers for it as it's VERY generic.  WiFi reception is pretty weak too so make sure you're close to your router..;)

Reviews.Title: Not too good
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these tablets. The Wi-Fi is weak, even in the same room as the router. There also is no way that I have found to upgrade the OS. The touch sensitivity on the screen is so sensitive that you just have to get close to the letter, and most the time you get double letters. It works ok to watch youtube videos, and check email, but not much else.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT AND 5 STAR CUSTOMER SERVICE.
Reviews.Author: desiree dopwell
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent for the kids. As for customer service i cannot describe how excellent his service was. I would recommended this product and seller to anyone. I AM PLEASEDDDDDDDDD!!!!!! Thanks goldengulf.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Al M. Green "Skuly22"
Reviews.Content: This item would freeze repeatedly and only lated a whole three months before it refused to work still all. I say save your money and buy areal tablet cause this was simply annoying.
